metadata.synopsis: One liner AD when player approaches Tarhun, the butler of  Jannath's estate, only if Oskar was saved. Tarhun will be anxious because he knows a supernatural event is happening but Jannath ordered him to stay outside.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Enter S_LOW_ThrowObjectTrigger while having previously rescued OskarLocation: CTY_Main_A -247; 21; -77

0.speaker: Tarhun Mnemonis
0.text: She will call for me soon, I'm sure of it.
